Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde are slight favourites heading into this clash as a result of their home form and Mauritania's struggles this year.
While the Blue Sharks lost woefully in their last game, the level of opposition they faced was on a different stratosphere, and is no indication of their quality as a team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde will host Mauritania at the Estadio Nacional de Cabo Verde in a 2025 Africa Cup of Nations qualifying match on Tuesday.

The Blue Sharks had kept five clean sheets in their last six matches across all competitions prior to the clash against the Pharaohs, but their defence fell like a pack of cards as they allowed eight shots on target with three going into the net.

Mauritania finally ended a run of five matches without a win when Sidi Bouna Amar came off the bench to score a stunner in the 84th minute, helping them secure a 1-0 victory over Botswana in their opening AFCON qualifying match.
Others: Cape Verde's form (all competitions): W, W, L, W, L
Mauritania's form (all competitions): L, L, D, L, L, W
